Title: Qur’an with Tajwīd: Tajwīd Advanced
Subtitle: Master Advanced Tajwīd for Scholarly Qur’an Recitation

FAQ.Question: Is this suitable for beginners?
FAQ.Answer: No. Prior knowledge of Tajwīd and fluent reading is required.

FAQ.Question: Can I enroll without prior Tajwīd knowledge?
FAQ.Answer: No. Solid foundation in Tajwīd is mandatory.

FAQ.Question: Do I need to memorize Tajwīd rules?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is applied naturally through guided practice.

FAQ.Question: Will I be ready to teach others?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course prepares you for both recitation and instruction.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With calm guidance, repeated correction, and detailed explanation.
